meanings.sent1: The uptilted roof allowed rainwater to flow easily.
meanings.sent2: The painting featured an uptilted horizon, giving it a dynamic feel.
meanings.sent3: The cat's uptilted ears made it look curious and attentive.
meanings.sent4: The uptilted mountains in the distance seemed to touch the sky.
meanings.sent5: The uptilted tree branches reached towards the sun, seeking light.

meanings.sent1: She uptilted her head to get a better view of the stage.
meanings.sent2: The gardener uptilted the soil to improve drainage.
meanings.sent3: The chef uptilted the pan to toss the vegetables in the air.
meanings.sent4: The dancer uptilted her body gracefully during the performance.
meanings.sent5: He uptilted the mirror to see his reflection from a different angle.
